sentence.Network_en: Her charm resides in her vivacity.
sentence.Network_cn: 她的魅力存在于她的活泼.

sentence.Network_en: He was charmed by her vivacity and high spirits.
sentence.Network_cn: 她的活泼与兴高采烈的情绪把他迷住了.

sentence.Network_en: It was , perhaps , Archer reflected, because her early vivacity had disappeared.
sentence.Network_cn: 阿切尔心想, 也许是因为她过去的欢乐已经不复存在了.

entry.def: If you say that someone has vivacity, you mean that they are lively, exciting, and attractive.

example.tran: 她超出常人的活力、魅力和才智

means.word_mean: 1. characterized by high spirits and animation

auth_sentence.content: That quiet pale girl, so lacking in spirit and vivacity.
auth_sentence.res_content: That quiet pale girl, so lacking in spirit and vivacity.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: That quiet pale girl, so lacking in spirit and vivacity.

auth_sentence.content: But she handled everything with an impeccable dignity and a refreshing vivacity.
auth_sentence.res_content: But she handled everything with an impeccable dignity and a refreshing vivacity.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But she handled everything with an impeccable dignity and a refreshing vivacity.

auth_sentence.content: What she has produced is a book of elegant layering and cultured vivacity.
auth_sentence.res_content: What she has produced is a book of elegant layering and cultured vivacity.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: What she has produced is a book of elegant layering and cultured vivacity.
